name: The Alphanumorph (Martin Isla)
description:
A gigantic alien is filling up your entire spaceship and trying to eat you!

Run for your life in this game, challenged by the Alphanumorph, spike traps and experimental movement controls!

You move by pressing the numbers in the upper section of your keyboard. Press the keys next to the number in the grid you're standing on to move left or right. Press the key that matches the number you're standing on to fly. You can move while flying!

The game is easy to learn, but hard to master! Challenge yourselves with these 3 levels and escape!

Made in 48hs for the Ludum Dare 42 "Running out of Space"

Martin Isla Macarena Haspert Franco Chioraia Katerine Olmazabal Matias Paredes Lorenzo Gutierrez

Thank you for playing :) We hope you like it Feedback is appreciated!

Rookbird Games
